name: Privacy Policy Generator & Notice Management | Securiti
author: Securiti

sections.description:
Securiti has developed a solution that will help you swiftly create and publish privacy notices onto your website in minutes. This solution offers the ability to:

  • Publish a privacy policy or notice quickly with a predefined template
  • Track & monitor privacy notices across your websites
  • Dynamically update your notice with website scanning

Securiti also helps developers meet privacy compliance with Data Subject Rights, Privacy Notice Management and Cookie Consent.

  • Universal Consent
  • Privacy Notice Management
  • DSR Portal

Overview

Use the Privacy Policy Generator & Notice Management Securiti plugin to rapidly deploy a privacy policy or notice on your website by simply pasting the embedded URL automatically into the script box.

GETTING STARTED

Sign up for a free account to retrieve the privacy policy or notice URL in a few easy steps.

HOW IT WORKS

  1. Register and gain access to a free account.
  2. Follow the intuitive step by step workflow
  3. Review and publish the content
  4. Copy the embedded URL and paste it in the plugin

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS

  • Publish a privacy policy or notice quickly with a predefined template
  • Automatically update & refresh your policies and notices
  • Track & monitor privacy notices across your websites
  • Dynamically update your notice with website scanning

Support

Email us at support@securiti.ai

DISCLAIMER

Use of this plugin does not, by itself, ensure compliance with legal requirements related to privacy policies or notices.

ABOUT

Securiti is a global leader in PrivacyOps. It helps you comply with global privacy laws including GDPR, CCPA, and ePrivacy and is powered by an award-winning platform.

Securiti is a Forrester Wave Leader, and named Most Innovative Company by RSA and IAPP.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin Free?

Yes. This plugin is free to use.

Will it protect my website?

Privacy notice and policies are requirements of global privacy regulations such as GDPR / CCPA. Note: Securiti does not ensure compliance with legal requirements related to privacy policies or notices.

Is the privacy notice GDPR/CCPA compliant?

The privacy notice template is built based on GDPR / CCPA. Note: Securiti does not ensure compliance with legal requirements related to privacy policies or notices.
